resources.string: Charity Checker is a mobile Android application that provides the user with relevant local charities/nonprofits with opportunities to donate. This app creates a user friendly environment that makes it easier to learn about local charities, locate donation bins, food banks, and blood donations.
Information provided by Google Places SDK and charitynavigator.com API.
This app was created by Alexis Romer and Hannah Lord in Spring 2022 for our Computer Science Senior Capstone project.
